page.title: 05HANWOOD GARAGE.
page.content:
Hanwood Garage has been managed by the present owner for 35 years.The owner currently sells two and a half thousand gallons of petrol per week. } The garage work_shop has 4 mechanics. {85% of the work is on private vehicles {and 15% agricultural machinery.}In the owner's early years at the garage the repair work was 60% agricultural machinery and 40% private vehicles. The work_shop handles{mechanical {repairs, accidental damage, general {servicing and M.O.T. }
{The garage shop}stocks car accessories, oil, maps, sweets, cigarettes, watches, calculators and ice cream. The{garage opens}6 days a week between 7.30am and 7.00pm.
